```{r}
#| context: setup
library(ggplot2)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(bslib)

choices <- c("species", "island") 
theme <- bs_theme()
```


```{r}
 page_sidebar(sidebar=
  sidebar(selectInput("variable", "Select Variable to color by", choices)),
  plotOutput("my_plot"), theme = theme
)
```

```{r}
#| context: server
#| include: false
 # bslib::bs_themer()
  
output$my_plot <- renderPlot({
  req(input$variable)
  bslib::bs_themer()
  ggplot(penguins) +
    aes(x=bill_length_mm, 
        y=bill_depth_mm, 
        color= .data[[input$variable]] ) +
    geom_point()
})

```
